entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Releases - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
.NET 10.0 Preview 1

Release

What's Changed

  • make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 by @Forgind in #42630

  • Always print manifest versions in workload list command by @Forgind in #42653
